lines.text: Secrets and lies! We're all in pain! Why can't we share our pain? I've spent my entire life trying to make people happy, and the three people I love the most in the world hate each other's guts, and I'm in the middle! I can't take it anymore!
[last lines]
Oh, this is the life, ain't it?
Yeah.
She can't help it; she never had enough love
I wouldn't know him if he stood up in my soup!
You gotta laugh, ain't ya sweetheart? Else you'd cry.
But sweetheart, I can't be your mother!
Why not?
Well... look at me!
I can still turn a few heads...
...and a few stomachs!
Life isn't fair then is it. Somebody always draws the short straw.

[to Hortense]
You look more like me than m'daughter does!
Where's this food, then? I'm ravishin'.
[Hortense laughs]
What?
[Hortense chuckles]
Can't miss what you never had!
Can't you?
Don't be stupid.
